txt.en: You have become a proficient Journeyman Weaponsmith! You may now use Expert Weaponsmith recipes, or continue to work towards Journeyman Weaponsmith mastery.\n\nAdditionally, you are now eligible to join the <rgb=#00FF00>Weaponsmith's Guild</rgb>, a special reputation faction open only to Expert Weaponsmiths. To join the Weaponsmith's Guild, seek out a Master or Mistress of Crafting Guilds.
